Implements PositionIndicatorView.

void CTPositionIndicatorView::SetPosIndSize (  XYDIM  size  ) 
 

APOXI-Internal method.

This method sets the PositionIndicator's default size. It is called by CustomizableTheme from its Update(...) method. It shouldn't be necessary for application programmers to use it.
